description: This file is a client entry point for a Remix application, responsible for hydrating the app in the browser using React's hydrateRoot; it sets up rendering with strict mode.

methods.name: startTransition
methods.description: Handles concurrent rendering to prevent blocking the main thread during hydration.

methods.name: hydrateRoot
methods.description: Hydrates the React app on the client, attaching event listeners and making the app interactive.
